title: Charcoal Grill 28" Barrel BBQ Smoker Barbecue Patio Backyard Outdoor Meat Cooker
item_description:
Introductions:
Get ready to impress your guests and indulge in smoky, flame-kissed flavors that will leave everyone craving for more with our 28-Inch Portable Charcoal Grill. Designed with convenience and functionality in mind, this grill is perfect for parties, camping trips, picnics, and more. With its large 28-inch grate, you'll have plenty of space to grill up mouthwatering burgers, sizzling steaks, and succulent veggies for all your friends and family. The porcelain-enameled lid and fire bowl ensure heat retention and durability, so you can enjoy perfectly grilled meals every time. Say goodbye to messy cleanup with the removable ash catcher and one-touch cleaning system that effortlessly removes charcoal ash and debris. Take full control of your grilling with adjustable air vent and a built-in thermometer for precise heat monitoring. Plus, the lid holder and hook rack keep things organized and within reach, providing convenience and efficiency while you work your magic on the grill.
  Features:
1. Spacious 28" BBQ Grill: 28-inch cooking grate provides ample room to grill up feasts for all your family and friends. It's the perfect companion for your backyard parties and outdoor gatherings. Porcelain-enameled lid and fire bowl not only retain heat for optimal cooking but also resist rust and peeling, ensuring long-lasting durability.
2. Versatile Cooking Options: Our grill features a removable round grate in the center, so you can grill smaller items like vegetables or delicate seafood with precision and ease. Enjoy the flexibility to cook a variety of dishes on this extra large grill.
3. Effortless Cleanup: Removable ash catcher and convenient one-touch cleaning system make cleanup a breeze. Spend less time cleaning and more time enjoying your delicious grilled creations.
4. Ultimate Heat Control: Adjustable air vent allows you to fine-tune the airflow. The built-in thermometer lets you monitor the internal temperature without lifting the lid to ensure precise heat control.
5. Elevated Grilling Experience: The lid holder and hook rack keep everything organized and within reach. The bottom storage shelf provides extra space to store your grilling essentials. Durable wheels allow you to effortlessly roll it to your desired grilling spot, making it perfect for camping trips, picnics, and any outdoor adventure.
  Specifications:
1. Dimensions: (28 x 28 x 37.4) in / (71 x 71 x 95) cm
2. Weight: 17 lbs / 7.7 kg
  Package Includes:
1 x Portable Charcoal Grill
1 x Side Storage Rack
  Notice:
1. Do not move the barbecue grill while it is being heated or in use.
2. This product is not intended for use by children alone, be extremely cautious when using this product near your child.
